column5: This listing is for HORSES or ranch friendly livestock. Owner is responsible for all risk and expenses involved with animal care. However, the field can be rented out for other purposes. Just watch your step...  10 large livestock animals is the suggested limit. Discounts for weekly or monthly stays apply. Please contact for arranging long-term care for small livestock or deer as fence modifications will be needed.
column8: Pasture Boarding 6 Acres - Everfree Shire Ranch
